description: A 16' Melodia. Irwin reports that the lowest octave �becomes quite heavy in some examples, and loses character�, while Audsley states that these twelve pipes are usually stopped. Examples Double Melodia 16', Great; Cathedral of the Incarnation, Garden City, Long Island, New York, USA. Double Melodia 16', Pedal; Convention Hall, Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA; Midmer-Losh 1929-32. Sound Clips
